Triggered during the process of uploading an asset.

import Tabs from "@theme/Tabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

```mdx-code-block
<Tabs groupId="functions">
<TabItem value="Rust">
```

```rust
#[on_upload_asset]
async fn on_upload_asset(context: OnUploadAssetContext) -> Result<(), String> {
    // Custom logic for handling asset uploads
    Ok(())
}
```

Similarly to [on_set_doc](#on_set_doc), the hook can scope the events to a particular list of collections or be left empty if it should never fire.

```mdx-code-block
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="TypeScript">
```

```typescript
export const onUploadAsset = defineHook<OnUploadAsset>({
  collections: [],
  run: async (context) => {
    // Custom logic for handling asset uploads
  }
});
```

Similarly to [on_set_doc](#on_set_doc), the hook must scope the events to a particular list of collections. If the array is left empty, the hook will never be called.
